nodes.bodyText: Please create a ticket to refactor this code and use a proper discovery mechanism (SPI or similar)
What about log the exception too?
What about log the exception too?

I think it would be generally better to avoid the term perturbed here if possible. Not that it makes any practical difference, but it may sound confusing to read about perturbation where this is actually just covering an execution (which contains perturbed inputs). So I would suggest to change that from perturbedResult to executionResult.
